Lyric:
[00:16.270]I'll be your light, your match, your burning sun
[00:19.510]I'll be the bright and black that's making you run
[00:23.710]And I feel alright, and we'll feel alright
[00:27.750]'Cause we'll work it out, yeah we'll work it out
[00:31.730]I'll be doin' this, if you ever doubt
[00:35.930]'til the love runs out, 'til the love runs out
[00:39.640]I'll be your ghost, your game, your stadium
[00:43.440]I'll be your fin, deep down, entrapped like one

[00:59.700]'til the love runs out, 'til the love runs out

[01:16.210]'til the love runs out, 'til the love runs out

[01:23.530]'til the love runs out, 'til the love runs out
